item.title: Adoptable Fridays – Franny
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Hey everyone, I am Franny and I’m from Fort Lauderdale, FL. I am available for adoption through the Cocker Rescue of Florida. I am a 3 year old rat terrier but I heard people calling me a “velcro dog” whatever that means. I need a forever home with people who appreciate my terrier sassy ways! Franny is absolutely a delight, she <small>...</small>
item.content:encoded:
Hey everyone, I am Franny and I’m from Fort Lauderdale, FL. I am available for adoption through the Cocker Rescue of Florida. I am a 3 year old rat terrier but I heard people calling me a “velcro dog” whatever that means. I need a forever home with people who appreciate my terrier sassy ways!

Franny is absolutely a delight, she is mellow in the house but always super happy to go for a walk, a jog, or a paddle in the kayak.
She is completely housebroken, good in a leash and will learn tricks for food.
Adoptions South Florida only!

item.title: Adoptable Fridays – Gadget
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Gadget is our foster dog from AHeinz57 Pet Rescue & Transport in De Soto, IA. He had a pretty rough start in life and we want to try to wipe the slate clean and start over. Gadget’s Foster Mom refers to him as the Matthew McConaughey of dogs because he is blonde, scruffy and very charming. Gadget is also a true terrier, <small>...</small>
item.content:encoded: Gadget is our foster dog from AHeinz57 Pet Rescue & Transport in De Soto, IA. He had a pretty rough start in life and we want to try to wipe the slate clean and start over. Gadget’s Foster Mom refers to him as the Matthew McConaughey of dogs because he is blonde, scruffy and very charming. Gadget is also a true terrier, friendly and bouncy and tons of fun. He loves to run and play outside with other dogs, and has an amazingly high vertical jump. Gadget would love a home with a fenced yard. Preferably with a 6ft privacy fence!

item.title: Adoptable Friday – Jessica
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Jessica is a sweet one and a half year old Corgi/Terrier mix from Arlington, VA. She’s up for adoption through Lost Dog and Cat Rescue Foundation. Jessica loves giving kisses. In fact, she doesn’t ever want to stop. She is a cuddly lap dog with a gorgeous golden coat. She is good with dogs and cats and very very sweet. She is cratetrained, quiet, <small>...</small>
item.content:encoded: Jessica is a sweet one and a half year old Corgi/Terrier mix from Arlington, VA. She’s up for adoption through Lost Dog and Cat Rescue Foundation. Jessica loves giving kisses. In fact, she doesn’t ever want to stop. She is a cuddly lap dog with a gorgeous golden coat. She is good with dogs and cats and very very sweet. She is cratetrained, quiet, and well-behaved in the house.   She is food-motivated, a quick learner, and eager to please.  She would prefer a relatively calm and quiet home environment.  She would make a great companion to an existing dog. Are you looking for a dog with the gorgeous coat of a golden retriever and the size and temperament of a lapdog? Then come meet Miss Jessica! Here is her profile.

item.title: Adoptable Fridays – Stubbs got adopted!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Stubbs outside his foster mom’s house with his new people! He was on adoptable Fridays back in December, and now he has a new home thanks to Dogshaming!
item.content:encoded: Stubbs outside his foster mom’s house with his new people! He was on adoptable Fridays back in December, and now he has a new home thanks to Dogshaming!

item.title: Proud Pups Eat Cushions!
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Hey Mom! We ate the porch swing cushions!! Aren’t you proud??? These two pups sure were proud of their hard work! They ate the porch swing cushions, the rocking chairs, and their food bowls! Good thing their smiles are so sweet!!! 
item.content:encoded: Hey Mom! We ate the porch swing cushions!! Aren’t you proud??? These two pups sure were proud of their hard work! They ate the porch swing cushions, the rocking chairs, and their food bowls! Good thing their smiles are so sweet!!! 

item.title: Blame the Boxer
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Came home to find a living room pillow de-stuffed and two guilty looking dogs. No one was talking.
item.content:encoded: Came home to find a living room pillow de-stuffed and two guilty looking dogs. No one was talking.

item.title: CJ, the Mouth
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Even though I have all of these toys just inside, I still ate one shoe from EVERY pair of Mommy’s high heels! (I’m a little ashamed…)
item.content:encoded: Even though I have all of these toys just inside, I still ate one shoe from EVERY pair of Mommy’s high heels! (I’m a little ashamed…)

item.title: Toasty Buns
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Whenever the heat comes on, I run over and stick my butt against the vent. I love toasty buns.
item.content:encoded: Whenever the heat comes on, I run over and stick my butt against the vent. I love toasty buns.

item.title: I Love My Balls
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: Harvey loves his tennis balls so much that he took his moms legs out from under her going after one. After a visit to the ER, diagnosis is a torn rotator cuff.
item.content:encoded: Harvey loves his tennis balls so much that he took his moms legs out from under her going after one. After a visit to the ER, diagnosis is a torn rotator cuff.

item.title: Bed Eater
item.dc:creator: dogkeeper
item.description: The day I discovered the chew marks on the bottom of my bed. I still have never seen her do it, but she knows she’s the guilty one.
item.content:encoded: The day I discovered the chew marks on the bottom of my bed. I still have never seen her do it, but she knows she’s the guilty one.
